display_name: [Infinite Power of Darkness] Dark King Mechikabura (Power of Time Unleashed)

kit.leader_skill: "Crossover" Category Ki +3 and HP, ATK & DEF +150%

super_attack.name: Darkness Execution (Extreme)
super_attack.effect: Greatly raises ATK; Greatly raises DEF for 1 turn; Causes supreme damage to enemy; Lowers ATK & DEF

passive_skill.name: Body that Absorbed Space and Time
passive_skill.effect: (Forever) Ki +1 and ATK & DEF 200% up; (Forever) Randomly changes Ki Spheres of a certain Type (AGL excluded) to Rainbow Ki Spheres; When attacking with 12 or more Ki: ATK & DEF 100% up; For every Ki Sphere obtained: ATK & DEF 25% up; 2 or more AGL Ki Spheres obtained: ATK & DEF 100% up; 2 or more STR or PHY Ki Spheres obtained: ATK 100% up; 2 or more TEQ or INT Ki Spheres obtained: DEF 100% up; For every Rainbow Ki Sphere obtained: Recovers 10% HP; Damage reduction rate 10% up; 2 or more Rainbow Ki Spheres obtained: Launches an additional Super Attack

lines.text: Randomly changes Ki Spheres of a certain Type (AGL excluded) to Rainbow Ki Spheres

lines.context: When attacking with 12 or more Ki
For every Ki Sphere obtained
2 or more AGL Ki Spheres obtained
2 or more STR or PHY Ki Spheres obtained
2 or more TEQ or INT Ki Spheres obtained
For every Rainbow Ki Sphere obtained
For every Rainbow Ki Sphere obtained
2 or more Rainbow Ki Spheres obtained
